text: Aja tuhade la'i sari'am pavitara cizam halala (ja'iza) kara diti'am ga'i'am hana. Ate kitaba vali'am (yahudi'am ate isa'i'am) da khana tuhade la'i halala hai ate tuhada khana unham la'i halala hai. Ate tuhade la'i halala hai, paka damana auratam ate imana rakhana vali'am auratam ate paka damana vali'am uha auratam jinham nu tuhade tom pahilam kitaba diti ga'i hai, jadom tusim unham nu mahira de devem nikaha vica li'a'una la'i na khul'he ama badakari karo ate na hi luka-dupa ke naja'iza prema sabadha bana'u. Jihara bada imana di ulaghana karega tam usa de karama barabada ho janage ate uha praloka vica nukasana utha'una vali'am vicom' hovega
